怀孕期间和产后的维生素D监测研究人员确定了怀孕期间维生素D水平的影响及其在母亲和婴儿健康结果中的作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250401/vitamin-d-monitoring-during-pregnancy-pregnancy-and-postpartum.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250401/vitamin-d-monitoring-during-pregnancy-pregnancy-and-postpartum.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=71DBDCE4-5215-48FE-A3D2-AD14C65E8F03 Tue, 01 Apr 2025 04:07:00 -0400 Vitamin D monitoring during pregnancy and postpartum
Novo Nordisk A/S：Rybelsus®（口服Semaglutide 14 mg）在ACC 2025的Soul试验中表现出较大的心血管事件的减少Novo Nordisk今天介绍了Soul心血管结局试验的全部结果，表明Rybelsus®（口服Semaglutide）显着降低了2型糖尿病和心血管疾病（CVD）和/或/或/或慢性肾脏病（CKD）的成年人中重大不良心血管事件的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250401/Novo-Nordisk-AS-Rybelsusc2ae-(oral-semaglutide-14-mg)-demonstrates-superior-reduction-in-cardiovascular-events-in-the-SOUL-trial-at-ACC-2025.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250401/Novo-Nordisk-AS-Rybelsusc2ae-(oral-semaglutide-14-mg)-demonstrates-superior-reduction-in-cardiovascular-events-in-the-SOUL-trial-at-ACC-2025.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fda375E1-1283-4200-B8DA-95CD87D85454 Tue, 01 Apr 2025 02:50:00 -0400 Novo Nordisk A/S: Rybelsus® (oral semaglutide 14 mg) demonstrates superior reduction in cardiovascular events in the SOUL trial at ACC 2025
研究表明，女性可以听到的声音比男人更好一支国际科学家团队发现，生物性别是解释听力敏感性差异的主要因素，女性的听力比男性更为敏感。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250401/study-shows-nows-women-can-shind-better-than-than-men.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250401/study-shows-nows-women-can-shind-better-than-than-men.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1246278B-9F19-455F-B771-43C1311F6FB9 Tue, 01 Apr 2025 02:43:00 -0400 Study shows women can hear better than men
研究找到了隐藏在电子健康记录中的高血压的线索大众杨百翰的研究人员的一项新研究表明，有关高血压的线索可能会埋葬在电子健康记录（EHR）中。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250401/study-finds-clues-clues-to-hypertension-hidded-hidden-in-electronic-health-records.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250401/study-finds-clues-to-hypertension-hidden-hidden-i-------------------------------------------------------------- in-electronic-health-records.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7547d0c8-c66b-4CA2-926D-9CFADC7FAFB2 Tue, 01 Apr 2025 01:34:47 -0400 Study finds clues to hypertension hidden in electronic health records
Mayo Clinic启动研究以调查阿尔茨海默氏症快速进行性痴呆大多数患有阿尔茨海默氏病和阿尔茨海默氏病有关的患者与痴呆症相关的痴呆症（ADRD）经历了认知症状的逐渐发作和进展，导致数年或几十年来下降。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250401/mayo-clinic-launches-study-to-to-to-investigate-nvestigate-rapidly-progressionly-progressive dementia-in-alzheimers.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250401/mayo-clinic-launches-study-to-to-to-nevestigate-rapidly-progressionly-progressive-------saspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9f555261A-B78C-4069-BAAF-40E9B0222B44 Tue, 01 Apr 2025 01:18:50 -0400 Mayo Clinic launches study to investigate rapidly progressive dementia in Alzheimer's
研究：心理健康提供者经常错过贪食症诊断当出现描述饮食不足的患者的行为和特征的小插图时，只有四分之一的精神健康提供者能够正确诊断神经性贪食症。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250401/study-mental-health-providers-forter-providers-often-miss-bulimia-diangnosis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250401/study-mental-health-providers-often-miss-bulimia-diangnosis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=352EA030-B2F3-4487-9B12-0D73020792D1 Tue, 01 Apr 2025 01:02:20 -0400 Study: Mental health providers often miss bulimia diagnosis
科学家发现了用于再生细胞和眼睛中细胞的关键基因根据在美国国家科学院（National Science）（PNAS）论文集（PNAS）上发表的一项新的小鼠研究，同样的基因可能是耳朵和眼睛中再生细胞的关键。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250401/scientists-discover-key-genes-genes-for-gener-generation-cells-cells-cells-in-the-arear-and-eye.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250401/scientists-discover-key-genes-genes-for-regenerating-cells-cells-in-cells-in-the-ear-al-and-eye.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4596ca45-7998-4b8b-bf4e-dadd8e76dcd8 Tue, 01 Apr 2025 00:36:47 -0400 Scientists discover key genes for regenerating cells in the ear and eye
玛丽皇后科学家发明了一种修复骨软骨缺陷的新方法伦敦皇后大学的科学家发明了一种修复骨软骨缺陷的新方法 - 一种常见的关节损害形式，通常是由运动损伤或创伤造成的 - 并防止发展为骨关节炎。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250401/queen-mary-scientists-ind-scientists-ind-avent-a-new-way-way-way-way-repair-osteochochondral-defects.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250401/queen-mary-scientists-ind-scientists-ind-avent-a-new-way-way-way-way-repair-osteochochondral-defects.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2C2B2585-9754-4A24-9A24-9A3F-51D2FB23988B Tue, 01 Apr 2025 00:04:52 -0400 Queen Mary scientists invent a new way to repair osteochondral defects
世界首先批准trofolastat进行男性前列腺癌的诊断成像药物和医疗保健产品监管机构（MHRA）批准了Trofolastat（Rotecpsma），这是第一个前列腺特异性膜抗原（PSMA） - 靶向产品，旨在与Technetium-99M一起使用，以检测患有前列腺癌的男性癌性病变。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250331/world-first-first-as-mhra-approves-trofolastat-for-diarostic-imengnostic-imaging-imaging-imaging-men.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250331/world-first-first-first-as-mhra-approves-trofolastat-for-dinostic-imagnostic-imaging-imaging-imaging-imaging-protate-cancer-cancer-in-men-in-men-men.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bc97cba2-fe04-4768-bffa-3209f972560b Mon, 31 Mar 2025 23:51:00 -0400 World first as MHRA approves trofolastat for diagnostic imaging of prostate cancer in men
患者导航器增加后续结肠镜检查并减少延迟亚利桑那大学健康科学领导的一项研究发现，如果患者导航员通过整个过程帮助他们，则在异常的粪便测试后，患者更有可能在粪便测试异常后接受结肠镜检查。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250331/patient-navigators-boost-follow-colonoscopies-and-colonoscopies-and-reduce-delays.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250331/patient-navigators-boost-follow-colonoscopies-and-colonoscopies-and-reduce-delays.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0035085e-a65e-43fb-8358-81C9DF0F9CC1 Mon, 31 Mar 2025 23:47:53 -0400 Patient navigators boost follow-up colonoscopies and reduce delays
